name: hbfa-unified-platform
description: Unified HBFA operations, sales, and reporting platform

scripts.deploy:dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation/main.yml --stack-name hbfa-unified-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation/main.yml --stack-name hbfa-unified-prod --parameter-overrides Environment=prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run deploy:dev && npm run deploy:lambdas
